Class DatabaseAttendance

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.DatabaseAttendance
public class DatabaseAttendance extends Object
Provides database operations related to attendance management, including fetching courses, students, attendance records, and saving/updating attendance. This class interacts with the database through SQL queries to support attendance tracking functionality for teachers and students.

    • getTeacherCoursesSections

      public static List<String[]> getTeacherCoursesSections(int teacherId)
      Retrieves a list of courses, sections, and programs taught by a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher
      Returns:
      List of String arrays, each containing course name, section, and program

    • getCoursesForTeacher

      public static CourseInfo[] getCoursesForTeacher(int teacherId)
      Retrieves an array of CourseInfo objects representing courses taught by a teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the ID of the teacher
      Returns:
      array of CourseInfo objects

    • getStudentsByProgramSection

      public static List<Student> getStudentsByProgramSection(String program, String section)
      Gets a list of students enrolled in a given program and section.
      Parameters:
      program - the program name
      section - the section name
      Returns:
      list of Student objects

    • fetchStudentsWithAttendanceForDate

      public static List<Student> fetchStudentsWithAttendanceForDate(int userId, String courseName, String section, String date)
      Fetches students along with their attendance status for a specific date, course, and section.
      Parameters:
      userId - the teacher's user ID
      courseName - the course name
      section - the section name
      date - the date string (e.g. "YYYY-MM-DD")
      Returns:
      list of Student objects with attendance info

    • getStudentsEnrolled

      public static List<Student> getStudentsEnrolled(String courseName, String program, String section)
      Retrieves students enrolled in a specific course, program, and section taught by the logged-in teacher.
      Parameters:
      courseName - the course name
      program - the program name
      section - the section name
      Returns:
      list of Student objects

    • saveAttendance

      public static int saveAttendance(int studentId, String date, String status, String reason, String program, String courseName, String section) throws SQLException
      Saves or updates attendance record for a student on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      date - the date string
      status - attendance status (e.g. Present, Absent, Late, Excused)
      reason - optional reason for the attendance status
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateStudentAttendance

      public static void updateStudentAttendance(int studentId, String date, String status, String program, String courseName, String section)
      Updates the attendance status of a student for a specific date, course, program, and section.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student whose attendance is being updated.
      date - The date of the attendance record in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".
      status - The new attendance status (e.g., "Present", "Absent", "Late").
      program - The program the student is enrolled in.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      section - The section of the class.

    • fetchAvailableCourses

      public static List<String> fetchAvailableCourses()
      Fetches a list of all distinct course names from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of course names as strings.
